subject: calculus
title: Calculus
description: Comprehensive single and multivariable calculus with deep focus on optimization, neural network training, and numerical methods for ML

chapters.title: Limits and Continuity
chapters.description: The foundation of calculus: limits and continuous functions

topics.title: Intuition of Limits
topics.description: Approaching a value, one-sided limits, graphical interpretation

topics.title: Epsilon-Delta Definition
topics.description: Precise definition, proving limits, working with the definition

topics.title: Limit Laws
topics.description: Sum, product, quotient rules, squeeze theorem

topics.title: Limits at Infinity
topics.description: Horizontal asymptotes, limits as x→∞, growth rates

topics.title: Continuity
topics.description: Definition, types of discontinuity, continuous functions

topics.title: Continuity Theorems
topics.description: IVT, EVT, continuous functions on closed intervals

topics.title: Derivative Definition
topics.description: Limit definition, rate of change, slope of tangent line

topics.title: Differentiability
topics.description: Differentiable vs continuous, corners and cusps

topics.title: Basic Differentiation Rules
topics.description: Power rule, constant multiple, sum/difference rules

topics.title: Product and Quotient Rules
topics.description: Product rule, quotient rule, derivations, examples

topics.title: Chain Rule
topics.description: Composite functions, chain rule statement, examples

topics.title: Derivatives of Exponentials and Logs
topics.description: e^x, ln(x), a^x, log_a(x), logarithmic differentiation

topics.title: Trigonometric Derivatives
topics.description: sin, cos, tan, sec, csc, cot derivatives

topics.title: Derivatives of Inverse Functions
topics.description: Inverse function theorem, arcsin, arctan derivatives

topics.title: Implicit Differentiation
topics.description: Implicitly defined functions, technique, applications

topics.title: Higher-Order Derivatives
topics.description: Second derivatives, nth derivatives, notation

chapters.title: Applications of Derivatives
chapters.description: Using derivatives to analyze functions and solve problems

topics.title: Related Rates
topics.description: Implicit differentiation with respect to time, word problems

topics.title: Linear Approximation
topics.description: Tangent line approximation, differentials, error estimation

topics.title: Mean Value Theorem
topics.description: Statement, proof, applications, Rolle's theorem

topics.title: Increasing/Decreasing Functions
topics.description: First derivative test, finding intervals

topics.title: Extrema of Functions
topics.description: Local and global, critical points, first/second derivative tests

topics.title: Concavity and Inflection Points
topics.description: Second derivative test, concave up/down, inflection points

topics.title: Optimization Problems
topics.description: Word problems, finding optimal values, constraints

topics.title: Curve Sketching
topics.description: Systematic approach using calculus tools

topics.title: L'Hôpital's Rule
topics.description: Indeterminate forms, statement, applications

topics.title: Antiderivatives
topics.description: Definition, basic antiderivatives, indefinite integrals

topics.title: Riemann Sums
topics.description: Left, right, midpoint sums, limit as n→∞

topics.title: Definite Integral
topics.description: Definition via Riemann sums, properties, interpretation

topics.title: Fundamental Theorem of Calculus
topics.description: Both parts, proof ideas, applications

topics.title: Integration by Substitution
topics.description: U-substitution, change of variable, examples

topics.title: Integration by Parts
topics.description: Formula, LIATE rule, reduction formulas

topics.title: Trigonometric Integrals
topics.description: Powers of sin/cos, trig substitution

topics.title: Partial Fractions
topics.description: Decomposition, linear and quadratic factors

topics.title: Improper Integrals
topics.description: Infinite limits, discontinuous integrands, convergence

chapters.title: Sequences and Series
chapters.description: Infinite sequences, series, and Taylor expansions

topics.title: Sequences
topics.description: Definition, limits, convergence, boundedness

topics.title: Infinite Series
topics.description: Definition, partial sums, convergence, geometric series

topics.title: Convergence Tests
topics.description: Integral, comparison, ratio, root tests

topics.title: Alternating Series
topics.description: Alternating series test, error bounds

topics.title: Power Series
topics.description: Definition, radius of convergence, interval of convergence

topics.title: Taylor and Maclaurin Series
topics.description: Taylor polynomials, Taylor series, common expansions

topics.title: Applications of Taylor Series
topics.description: Approximations, limits, integrals, error bounds

chapters.title: Multivariable Calculus
chapters.description: Functions of multiple variables and their derivatives

topics.title: Functions of Several Variables
topics.description: Definition, domains, graphs, level curves/surfaces

topics.title: Partial Derivatives
topics.description: Definition, computation, geometric interpretation

topics.description: Mixed partials, Clairaut's theorem, Hessian matrix

topics.title: The Gradient
topics.description: Definition, properties, direction of steepest ascent

topics.title: Directional Derivatives
topics.description: Definition, formula using gradient, interpretation

topics.title: Multivariable Chain Rule
topics.description: Chain rule for compositions, tree diagrams

topics.title: Tangent Planes and Linear Approximation
topics.description: Tangent plane equation, linearization, differentials

topics.description: Definition, linear approximation, coordinate transformations

topics.description: Finding critical points, nabla f = 0, singular points

topics.description: Hessian determinant, classifying critical points

topics.description: Constrained optimization, one constraint

topics.description: Several equality constraints, geometric interpretation

topics.description: Definition, second derivative characterization, Jensen's inequality

topics.title: KKT Conditions
topics.description: Inequality constraints, complementary slackness

topics.description: Definition, iterated integrals, Fubini's theorem

topics.description: Polar coordinates, Jacobian r, applications

topics.description: Definition, order of integration, applications

topics.description: Coordinate systems, Jacobians, volume integrals

topics.title: Change of Variables
topics.description: General substitution, Jacobian determinant

topics.title: Vector Fields
topics.description: Definition, visualization, flow, examples

topics.title: Line Integrals
topics.description: Scalar and vector line integrals, work, circulation

topics.title: Conservative Fields
topics.description: Path independence, potential functions, fundamental theorem

topics.title: Divergence and Curl
topics.description: Definitions, physical interpretation, identities

topics.title: Green's Theorem
topics.description: Statement, proof sketch, applications

topics.title: Surface Integrals
topics.description: Scalar and vector surface integrals, flux

topics.title: Stokes' and Divergence Theorems
topics.description: Generalizations of Green's theorem, applications

chapters.title: Calculus for Machine Learning
chapters.description: Direct applications to ML, optimization, and neural networks

topics.title: Gradient Descent
topics.description: Algorithm, learning rate, convergence, variants (SGD, mini-batch)

topics.title: Convergence Analysis
topics.description: Convergence rates, Lipschitz gradients, strong convexity

topics.description: Momentum, Nesterov, Adam, RMSprop

topics.title: Backpropagation
topics.description: Chain rule in neural networks, computational graphs

topics.title: Automatic Differentiation
topics.description: Forward mode, reverse mode, implementation

topics.title: Matrix Calculus
topics.description: Derivatives with respect to vectors/matrices, gradient of trace, chain rule

topics.title: Loss Function Derivatives
topics.description: MSE, cross-entropy, softmax gradients

topics.description: L1, L2 penalties, gradient effects, proximal operators

topics.title: ODEs for Neural Networks
topics.description: Neural ODEs, continuous-depth networks, adjoint method
